summary: Completed comprehensive testing of EstadísticaMente Nivel Secundario module. All backend APIs pass (15/15 tests). Frontend UI testing shows all major features working correctly including Dashboard, Proyectos, Gráficos, Análisis, and Profe Marce chatbot.

issues: Page redirects to Proyectos when no project is selected - this is expected behavior but could show a more informative message

critical_code_review_comments: ESLint warnings in frontend about missing useEffect dependencies (GraficosPrimaria.js, GraficosSecundario.js, AnalisisSecundario.js, CargaDatosSecundario.js) - these are minor and don't affect functionality
Authentication is MOCKED - AuthContext uses localStorage demo user instead of real Firebase auth
seed_data_creation: Example projects (Mundial 2026, Edades, Horas de Estudio) can be loaded from Proyectos page
context_for_next_testing_agent: All secundario level features are working. Backend APIs tested: projects CRUD, datasets, statistics, chat, reports, examples. Frontend pages tested: Dashboard, Proyectos, Gráficos, Análisis, Profe Marce, Descargar. The Carga Datos page requires a project to be selected first (via localStorage currentProjectId).

features_tested.Dashboard Secundario: PASS - Shows welcome section, stats, quick actions, recent projects
features_tested.Proyectos de Ejemplo: PASS - Mundial 2026, Edades, Horas de Estudio load correctly
features_tested.Crear Nuevo Proyecto: PASS - Dialog opens, form works, redirects to carga datos
features_tested.Gráficos con Datos: PASS - Bar charts, pie charts render with Mundial 2026 data
features_tested.Análisis Estadístico: PASS - Frequency table shows fi, fri, %, Fi, Fri, %Ac columns. Statistics show N, Moda
features_tested.Profe Marce Chatbot: PASS - AI responds in Spanish Argentinian with LaTeX formulas
features_tested.Sidebar Navigation: PASS - All 8 menu items navigate correctly

mocked_apis.AuthContext: Login/logout is mocked using localStorage demo user
